Ro.intro: Welcome to the land of...wait, where am I?

message.#text: And who might you be, young one?

choices.#text: Why should I tell an old man like you?

message.#text: Well, youre an uppity one, aren't you? No matter.
Ha! Settle down, let's not get ahead of ourselves.
Wow, seems like you haven't sorted out your JSON very well yet.
My name is Ro, and I am a lifelong scholar of the magic energy found here. Would you appease an old man and listen for a bit about it?

choices.#text: I don't have time for this!

message.#text: Be on your way then. I don't have time for rude adventurers.
Fine, I'll be waiting here if you ever want to hear about magic.
Finally, someone I can force to listen to me!
I actually have nothing to say right now about this, maybe one day one of my creators will delete this whole script anyway!
